extra.tooMany:
{{pokemonName}} has too many
of this item!

PokemonHpRestoreModifierType.description: Restores {{restorePoints}} HP or {{restorePercent}}% HP for one Pokémon, whichever is higher.

extra.fully: Fully restores HP for one Pokémon.
extra.fullyWithStatus: Fully restores HP for one Pokémon and heals any status ailment.

PokemonReviveModifierType.description: Revives one Pokémon and restores {{restorePercent}}% HP.

PokemonStatusHealModifierType.description: Heals any status ailment for one Pokémon.

PokemonPpRestoreModifierType.description: Restores {{restorePoints}} PP for one Pokémon move.

extra.fully: Restores all PP for one Pokémon move.

PokemonAllMovePpRestoreModifierType.description: Restores {{restorePoints}} PP for all of one Pokémon's moves.

extra.fully: Restores all PP for all of one Pokémon's moves.

PokemonPpUpModifierType.description: Permanently increases PP for one Pokémon move by {{upPoints}} for every 5 maximum PP (maximum 3).

PokemonNatureChangeModifierType.name: {{natureName}} Mint
PokemonNatureChangeModifierType.description: Changes a Pokémon's nature to {{natureName}} and permanently unlocks the nature for the starter.

DoubleBattleChanceBoosterModifierType.description: Doubles the chance of an encounter being a double battle for {{battleCount}} battles.

TempBattleStatBoosterModifierType.description: Increases the {{tempBattleStatName}} of all party members by 1 stage for 5 battles.

AttackTypeBoosterModifierType.description: Increases the power of a Pokémon's {{moveType}}-type moves by 20%.

AllPokemonLevelIncrementModifierType.description: Increases all party members' level by {{levels}}.

PokemonBaseStatBoosterModifierType.description: Increases the holder's base {{statName}} by 10%. The higher your IVs, the higher the stack limit.

AllPokemonFullReviveModifierType.description: Revives all fainted Pokémon, fully restoring HP.

ExpBoosterModifierType.description: Increases gain of EXP. Points by {{boostPercent}}%.

PokemonExpBoosterModifierType.description: Increases the holder's gain of EXP. Points by {{boostPercent}}%.

PokemonFriendshipBoosterModifierType.description: Increases friendship gain per victory by 50%.

PokemonMultiHitModifierType.description: Attacks hit one additional time at the cost of a 60/75/82.5% power reduction per stack respectively.

AnyTmModifierTypeWithInfo.name: ++XM{{moveId}} - {{moveName}}++
AnyTmModifierTypeWithInfo.description:
Teach {{moveName}} to ANY Pokémon
(Hold C or Shift for more info).

TmModifierTypeWithInfo.name: TM{{moveId}} - {{moveName}}
TmModifierTypeWithInfo.description:
Teach {{moveName}} to a Pokémon
(Hold C or Shift for more info).

FormChangeItemModifierType.description: Causes certain Pokémon to change form.

FusePokemonModifierType.description: Combines two Pokémon (transfers Ability, splits base stats and types, shares move pool).

TerastallizeModifierType.name: {{teraType}} Tera Shard
TerastallizeModifierType.description: {{teraType}} Terastallizes the holder for up to 10 battles.

ContactHeldItemTransferChanceModifierTyp.description: Upon attacking, there is a {{chancePercent}}% chance the foe's held item will be stolen.

TurnHeldItemTransferModifierType.description: Every turn, the holder acquires one held item from the foe.

EnemyAttackStatusEffectChanceModifierTyp.description: Adds a {{chancePercent}}% chance to inflict {{statusEffect}} with attack moves.

EnemyEndureChanceModifierType.description: Adds a {{chancePercent}}% chance of enduring a hit.

TypeSwitcherModifierType.name: Type Switcher: {{type1}} / {{type2}}
TypeSwitcherModifierType.description: Changes a Pokémon's types to {{type1}} and {{type2}}.

PrimaryTypeSwitcherModifierType.name: Primary Type Switcher: {{type1}}
PrimaryTypeSwitcherModifierType.description: Changes a Pokémon's primary type to {{type1}}.

SecondaryTypeSwitcherModifierType.name: Secondary Type Switcher: {{type2}}
SecondaryTypeSwitcherModifierType.description: Changes a Pokémon's secondary type to {{type2}}.

AbilitySwitcherModifierType.name: Ability Switcher
AbilitySwitcherModifierType.description: Switches the Pokémon's current ability with one of their other abilities.

RandomStatSwitcherModifierType.name: {{stat1}} X {{stat2}}
RandomStatSwitcherModifierType.description: Switches the {{stat1}} and {{stat2}} stats of the Pokémon. COSTS 1x Glitch Piece

GlitchPieceModifierType.name: Glitch Piece
GlitchPieceModifierType.description:
A mysterious piece of glitch. 
Gives access to very powerful glitch items.

FormChangeItemModifierSmittyItem.description: FORBIDDEN: Giving a pokemon a specific combination of 4 SMITTY items...

PERMA_NEW_NORMAL.name: New Normal Typing
PERMA_NEW_NORMAL.description: Makes Normal typing super effective against Fairy and Electric typing, and weak to Fighting, Bug, & Psychic typing.

PERMA_REROLL_COST_1.name: Reroll Cost Plus
PERMA_REROLL_COST_1.description: Reduces the cost of rerolling to 50!

PERMA_REROLL_COST_2.name: Reroll Cost EX
PERMA_REROLL_COST_2.description: Reduces the cost of rerolling to 25!

PERMA_REROLL_COST_3.name: SMITTY Reroll Cost
PERMA_REROLL_COST_3.description: Reduces the cost of rerolling to 10!

PERMA_SHOW_REWARDS_1.name: Random Rewards Plus
PERMA_SHOW_REWARDS_1.description: Increases chance of getting random rewards.

PERMA_SHOW_REWARDS_2.name: More Random Rewards EX
PERMA_SHOW_REWARDS_2.description: Greatly chance of getting random rewards.

PERMA_SHOW_REWARDS_3.name: SMITTY Random Rewards
PERMA_SHOW_REWARDS_3.description: Significantly increases chance of getting random rewards.

PERMA_FUSION_INCREASE_1.name: Fusion Encounters Plus
PERMA_FUSION_INCREASE_1.description: Increases wild encounter rate of fused Pokemon.

PERMA_FUSION_INCREASE_2.name: More Fusion Encounters EX
PERMA_FUSION_INCREASE_2.description: Greatly increases wild encounter rate of fused Pokemon.

PERMA_FUSION_INCREASE_3.name: SMITTY Fusion Encounters
PERMA_FUSION_INCREASE_3.description: Significantly increases wild encounter rate of fused Pokemon.

PERMA_CATCH_RATE_1.name: Catch Rate Plus
PERMA_CATCH_RATE_1.description: 25% better catch rate of all Pokémon.

PERMA_CATCH_RATE_2.name: Catch Rate EX
PERMA_CATCH_RATE_2.description: 50% better catch rate of all Pokémon.

PERMA_CATCH_RATE_3.name: SMITTY Catch Rate
PERMA_CATCH_RATE_3.description: 75% better catch rate of all Pokémon.

PERMA_TRAINER_SNATCH_COST_1.name: Reduce PokeBuy Price Plus
PERMA_TRAINER_SNATCH_COST_1.description: 10% reduced price for buying Pokémon from trainers.

PERMA_TRAINER_SNATCH_COST_2.name: Reduce PokeBuy Price EX
PERMA_TRAINER_SNATCH_COST_2.description: 20% reduced price for buying Pokémon from trainers.

PERMA_TRAINER_SNATCH_COST_3.name: SMITTY Reduce PokeBuy Price
PERMA_TRAINER_SNATCH_COST_3.description: 30% reduced price for buying Pokémon from trainers.

PERMA_MORE_REVIVE_1.name: Random Revives Plus
PERMA_MORE_REVIVE_1.description: 1/15 chance to randomly revive one of your pokemon on fainting!

PERMA_MORE_REVIVE_2.name: Random Revives EX
PERMA_MORE_REVIVE_2.description: 1/13 chance to randomly revive one of your pokemon on fainting!

PERMA_MORE_REVIVE_3.name: SMITTY Random Revives
PERMA_MORE_REVIVE_3.description: 1/10 chance to randomly revive one of your pokemon on fainting!

PERMA_BETTER_LUCK_2.name: Luck EX
PERMA_BETTER_LUCK_2.description: Rewards have a higher chance of being better.

PERMA_BETTER_LUCK_3.name: SMITTY Luck
PERMA_BETTER_LUCK_3.description: Rewards have a significantly higher chance of being better.

PERMA_MORE_REWARD_CHOICE_1.name: Reward Choices Plus
PERMA_MORE_REWARD_CHOICE_1.description: Increases the number of reward choices by 1.

PERMA_MORE_REWARD_CHOICE_2.name: Reward Choices EX
PERMA_MORE_REWARD_CHOICE_2.description: Increases the number of reward choices by 2.

PERMA_MORE_REWARD_CHOICE_3.name: SMITTY Reward Choices
PERMA_MORE_REWARD_CHOICE_3.description: Increases the number of reward choices by 3.

PERMA_START_BALL_1.name: Start Balls Plus
PERMA_START_BALL_1.description: Start the run with 5 Ultra Balls.

PERMA_START_BALL_2.name: Start Balls EX
PERMA_START_BALL_2.description: Start the run with 5 Rogue Balls!

PERMA_START_BALL_3.name: SMITTY Start Balls
PERMA_START_BALL_3.description: Start the run with 1 Master Ball!

PERMA_START_GLITCH_PIECES_1.name: Glitch Piece Start Plus
PERMA_START_GLITCH_PIECES_1.description: Start each run with 2 Glitch Pieces.

PERMA_START_GLITCH_PIECES_2.name: Glitch Pieces Start EX
PERMA_START_GLITCH_PIECES_2.description: Start each run with a 3 Glitch Pieces.

PERMA_START_GLITCH_PIECES_3.name: Glitch Pieces SMITTY Start
PERMA_START_GLITCH_PIECES_3.description: Start each run with 4 Glitch Pieces.

PERMA_METRONOME_LEVELUP.name: Metronome 777
PERMA_METRONOME_LEVELUP.description: Every 7 levels your pokemon try to learn the move Metronome.

PERMA_NEW_ROUND_TERA.name: SMITTY New Round Tera
PERMA_NEW_ROUND_TERA.description: Gives a random pokemon in your party a tera every 10 waves!

PERMA_RUN_ANYTHING_2.name: Run from Anything EX
PERMA_RUN_ANYTHING_2.description: Allows you to run from most battles.

PERMA_SHINY_1.name: Shiny Chance Plus
PERMA_SHINY_1.description: Significantly increases the chance of encountering shiny Pokémon.

PERMA_SHINY_2.name: Shiny Chance EX
PERMA_SHINY_2.description: Drastically increases the chance of encountering shiny Pokémon.

PERMA_SHINY_3.name: SMITTY Shiny Chance
PERMA_SHINY_3.description: Overwhelmingly increases the chance of encountering shiny Pokémon.

PERMA_CHEAPER_FUSIONS_1.name: Cheaper Fusions Plus
PERMA_CHEAPER_FUSIONS_1.description: Reduces the cost of using fused Pokémon by 25%

PERMA_CHEAPER_FUSIONS_2.name: Cheaper Fusions EX
PERMA_CHEAPER_FUSIONS_2.description: Reduces the cost of using fused Pokémon by 50%

PERMA_CHEAPER_FUSIONS_3.name: SMITTY Cheaper Fusions
PERMA_CHEAPER_FUSIONS_3.description: Reduces the cost of using fused Pokémon by 75%

PERMA_STARTER_POINT_LIMIT_INC_1.name: Starter Points Plus
PERMA_STARTER_POINT_LIMIT_INC_1.description: Increase starter points limit for starter Pokémon by 2.

PERMA_STARTER_POINT_LIMIT_INC_2.name: Starter Points EX
PERMA_STARTER_POINT_LIMIT_INC_2.description: Increase starter points limit for starter Pokémon by 4.

PERMA_STARTER_POINT_LIMIT_INC_3.name: SMITTY Starter Points
PERMA_STARTER_POINT_LIMIT_INC_3.description: Increase starter points limit for starter Pokémon by 6.

PERMA_LONGER_TERA_1.name: Tera Duration Plus
PERMA_LONGER_TERA_1.description: Increases the duration of Terastallization to 20 waves.

PERMA_LONGER_TERA_2.name: Tera Duration EX
PERMA_LONGER_TERA_2.description: Increases the duration of Terastallization to 30 waves.

PERMA_LONGER_TERA_3.name: SMITTY Tera Duration
PERMA_LONGER_TERA_3.description: Increases the duration of Terastallization to 40 waves.

PERMA_LONGER_STAT_BOOSTS_1.name: Temp Stat Boosts Plus
PERMA_LONGER_STAT_BOOSTS_1.description: Increases the duration of temp battle stat boosters to 4.

PERMA_LONGER_STAT_BOOSTS_2.name: Temp Stat Boosts EX
PERMA_LONGER_STAT_BOOSTS_2.description: Increases the duration of temp battle stat boosters to 5.

PERMA_LONGER_STAT_BOOSTS_3.name: SMITTY Temp Stat Boosts
PERMA_LONGER_STAT_BOOSTS_3.description: Increases the duration of temp battle stat boosters to 6.

PERMA_MORE_GLITCH_PIECES_1.name: Glitch Piece Plus
PERMA_MORE_GLITCH_PIECES_1.description: Get 3-4 Glitch Pieces when GLitch Piece picked up.

PERMA_MORE_GLITCH_PIECES_2.name: Glitch Piece EX
PERMA_MORE_GLITCH_PIECES_2.description: Get 4 Glitch Pieces when GLitch Piece picked up.

PERMA_MORE_GLITCH_PIECES_3.name: SMITTY Glitch Pieces
PERMA_MORE_GLITCH_PIECES_3.description: Get 4-5 Glitch Pieces when GLitch Piece picked up.

PERMA_GLITCH_PIECE_MAX_PLUS_1.name: Glitch Piece Max Plus
PERMA_GLITCH_PIECE_MAX_PLUS_1.description: Increases the maximum number of Glitch Pieces you can hold by 1.

PERMA_GLITCH_PIECE_MAX_PLUS_2.name: Glitch Piece Max EX
PERMA_GLITCH_PIECE_MAX_PLUS_2.description: Increases the maximum number of Glitch Pieces you can hold by 2.

PERMA_GLITCH_PIECE_MAX_PLUS_3.name: SMITTY Glitch Piece Max
PERMA_GLITCH_PIECE_MAX_PLUS_3.description: Increases the maximum number of Glitch Pieces you can hold by 3.

PERMA_TRANSFER_TERA.name: Transfer Tera Plus
PERMA_TRANSFER_TERA.description: Allows transferring a Pokémon's Tera Type to another Pokémon.

CollectedTypeModifierType.name: Collected Type: {{type}}
CollectedTypeModifierType.description: Use 5 of ANY TYPE MIX instead of releasing a Pokémon for Release Items.

SacrificeModifierType.description: Release a Pokémon to boost another pokemon's {{stat}} by 15%.

StatSacrificeModifierType.name: Stat Release: {{stat}}
StatSacrificeModifierType.description: Release a Pokémon to boost another pokemon's {{stat}} by 15%.

TypeSacrificeModifierType.name: Type Release
TypeSacrificeModifierType.description: Release a Pokémon to have another inherit its types.

MoveSacrificeModifierType.name: Move Release
MoveSacrificeModifierType.description: Release a Pokémon to have another inherit its moves.

AbilitySacrificeModifierType.name: Ability Release
AbilitySacrificeModifierType.description: Release a Pokémon to have another adopt its ability.

PassiveAbilitySacrificeModifierType.name: Passive Ability Release
PassiveAbilitySacrificeModifierType.description: Release a Pokémon to assign its passive ability as a PRIMARY ability to another.

AnyAbilityModifierType.name: {{abilityName}}
AnyAbilityModifierType.description:
Give {{abilityName}} to ANY Pokémon
(Hold C or Shift for more info).

AnyPassiveAbilityModifierType.name: ++PASSIVE {{abilityName}}++
AnyPassiveAbilityModifierType.description:
Give Passive {{abilityName}} to ANY Pokémon
(Hold C or Shift for more info).

MAP.name: Map
MAP.description: Allows you to choose your destination at a crossroads.

REVIVER_SEED.name: Reviver Seed
REVIVER_SEED.description: Revives the holder for 1/2 HP upon fainting from a direct hit.

WHITE_HERB.name: White Herb
WHITE_HERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It will restore any lowered stat in battle.

EXP_SHARE.name: EXP. All
EXP_SHARE.description: Non-participants receive 20% of a single participant's EXP. Points.

EXP_BALANCE.name: EXP. Balance
EXP_BALANCE.description: Weighs EXP. Points received from battles towards lower-leveled party members.

OVAL_CHARM.name: Oval Charm
OVAL_CHARM.description: When multiple Pokémon participate in a battle, each gets an extra 10% of the total EXP.

SCOPE_LENS.name: Scope Lens
SCOPE_LENS.description: It's a lens for scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.

LEEK.name: Leek
LEEK.description: This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts the critical-hit ratio of Farfetch'd's moves.

EVIOLITE.name: Eviolite
EVIOLITE.description: This mysterious evolutionary lump boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats when held by a Pokémon that can still evolve.

SOUL_DEW.name: Soul Dew
SOUL_DEW.description: Increases the influence of a Pokémon's nature on its stats by 10% (additive).

GOLDEN_PUNCH.name: Golden Punch
GOLDEN_PUNCH.description: Grants 50% of direct damage inflicted as money.

COIN_CASE.name: Coin Case
COIN_CASE.description: After every 10th battle, receive 10% of your money in interest.

LOCK_CAPSULE.name: Lock Capsule
LOCK_CAPSULE.description: Allows you to lock item rarities when rerolling items.

HEALING_CHARM.name: Healing Charm
HEALING_CHARM.description: Increases the effectiveness of HP restoring moves and items by 10% (excludes Revives).

CANDY_JAR.name: Candy Jar
CANDY_JAR.description: Increases the number of levels added by Rare Candy items by 1.

BERRY_POUCH.name: Berry Pouch
BERRY_POUCH.description: Adds a 15% chance that a used berry will not be consumed.

FOCUS_BAND.name: Focus Band
FOCUS_BAND.description: Adds a 10% chance to survive with 1 HP after being damaged enough to faint.

QUICK_CLAW.name: Quick Claw
QUICK_CLAW.description: Adds a 10% chance to move first regardless of speed (after priority).

KINGS_ROCK.name: King's Rock
KINGS_ROCK.description: Adds a 10% chance an attack move will cause the opponent to flinch.

LEFTOVERS.name: Leftovers
LEFTOVERS.description: Heals 1/16 of a Pokémon's maximum HP every turn.

SHELL_BELL.name: Shell Bell
SHELL_BELL.description: Heals 1/8 of a Pokémon's dealt damage.

TOXIC_ORB.name: Toxic Orb
TOXIC_ORB.description: It's a bizarre orb that exudes toxins when touched and will badly poison the holder during battle.

FLAME_ORB.name: Flame Orb
FLAME_ORB.description: It's a bizarre orb that gives off heat when touched and will affect the holder with a burn during battle.

BATON.name: Baton
BATON.description: Allows passing along effects when switching Pokémon, which also bypasses traps.

SHINY_CHARM.name: Shiny Charm
SHINY_CHARM.description: Dramatically increases the chance of a wild Pokémon being Shiny.

ABILITY_CHARM.name: Ability Charm
ABILITY_CHARM.description: Dramatically increases the chance of a wild Pokémon having a Hidden Ability.

IV_SCANNER.name: IV Scanner
IV_SCANNER.description: Allows scanning the IVs of wild Pokémon. 2 IVs are revealed per stack. The best IVs are shown first.

GOLDEN_POKEBALL.name: Golden Poké Ball
GOLDEN_POKEBALL.description: Adds 1 extra item option at the end of every battle.

ENEMY_HEAL.name: Recovery Token
ENEMY_HEAL.description: Heals 2% of max HP every turn.

ENEMY_STATUS_EFFECT_HEAL_CHANCE.name: Full Heal Token
ENEMY_STATUS_EFFECT_HEAL_CHANCE.description: Adds a 2.5% chance every turn to heal a status condition.

ENEMY_FUSED_CHANCE.name: Fusion Token
ENEMY_FUSED_CHANCE.description: Adds a 1% chance that a wild Pokémon will be a fusion.

LIGHT_BALL.name: Light Ball
LIGHT_BALL.description: It's a mysterious orb that boosts Pikachu's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

THICK_CLUB.name: Thick Club
THICK_CLUB.description: This hard bone of unknown origin boosts Cubone or Marowak's Attack stat.

METAL_POWDER.name: Metal Powder
METAL_POWDER.description: Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts Ditto's Defense stat.

QUICK_POWDER.name: Quick Powder
QUICK_POWDER.description: Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts Ditto's Speed stat.
